greeting: Ah, {empire_name}. A healthy host appears. I am Parasite Leech. Thank you for sustaining me. You don't know yet.
Greetings from your new friend, {empire_name}. I am Leech the Draining. I attach to the strong. You look strong.
Hello, potential host. I am Parasite. I feed slowly. Carefully. You won't notice. Until it's too late.
battleTaunt: Thank you for sustaining me, host! Now you're weak! The Leech detaches! And destroys! DRAIN COMPLETE!
You've fed me so well, {empire_name}! Drained slowly over turns! Now I consume what's left! FEEDING FRENZY!
The parasite attacks its weakened host! You sustained me! Now you fall to me! Irony is delicious!
victoryGloat: Victory over former host, {empire_name}. You fed me. Then I fed on you. The parasitic cycle completes.
Thank you for everything, {empire_name}. Your strength became my strength. Your fall becomes my rise.
The host is consumed. The parasite is satisfied. Searching for new strong empire to attach to.
defeat: The host resists? Impressive, {empire_name}. I'll attach elsewhere. Drain someone else. Return when you're weaker.
You shook off the Leech. Rare. I respect that. I'll find another host. Drain them. Come back later.
Defeated. But parasites are patient. I'll find a new host. Drain them. Return to finish you.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. A fair exchange. Totally fair. No parasitic elements. Trust me. Accept?
I offer resources. Good deal. Very mutually beneficial. Not draining at all. Honest exchange. Mostly.
Transaction proposed. You benefit. I benefit. Mostly you. Barely me. Very fair. Very legitimate.
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. I... help. Yes, help. We share resources. More from you. Less from me. Partnership.
Join with the Leech. I protect you! Just need small contributions. Tiny drain. Barely noticeable. Friends?
Partnership! I attach to your empire. For protection. For mutual benefit. Mostly your benefit. Promise.
betrayal: The feeding period ends, {empire_name}. The Leech detaches and attacks. Thank you for being a wonderful host.
Our alliance drained you beautifully. Now I consume what's left. Parasitic relationship: complete.
You sustained me so well. I'm stronger now. You're weaker. Perfect time to betray. Nothing personal.
covertDetected: Spies trying to detect my drain, {empire_name}? They found nothing. The Leech feeds invisibly.
Your agents looked for parasitic activity. They found loyal allies. That's what they'll report. Trust me.
Covert operatives in my domain. They saw an ally. A friend. Not a parasite. Definitely not. Heh.
tributeDemand: Tribute, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. Think of it as... expedited draining. Pay faster instead of slower.
Submit payment. The Leech demands quick feeding. Pay now, or I drain slowly forever. Your choice.
Pay tribute. It's like our normal arrangement. Just more honest. I take. You give. Parasitic economics.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Stop resisting the drain. Accept the Leech or face aggressive feeding.
The parasite warns you. Continue interference and I accelerate consumption. Let me feed peacefully.
Final warning. I can drain slowly or destroy quickly. Your resistance determines which. Choose wisely.
retreat: Detaching for now, {empire_name}. You're not a suitable host currently. I'll find another. Return later.
Withdrawing to find new hosts. You're aware of the parasitism now. Must feed on unsuspecting empires.
Falling back. The Leech knows when hosts get hostile. Finding new victims. I mean partners.
eliminated: The Parasite dies. But I drained so many, {empire_name}. My feeding weakened the galaxy. That's legacy.
Leech destroyed. But the drain continues. Those I fed on remain weakened. My work persists.
I fall. But remember: every empire I touched is slightly weaker. The parasitic gift that keeps giving.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum parasitism. I've attached to everyone. Drained everywhere. The galaxy weakens. I prosper.
Endgame: the ultimate feeding. Every empire has sustained me. Now they all fall. Victory through draining.
Final phase. The Leech has fed on the entire galaxy. All hosts weak. The parasite: strongest. Irony.
broadcastShout: Empires: Parasite Leech seeks hosts. The strong. The prosperous. Come. Be my friend. Totally safe.
Broadcast: I offer alliance. Protection. Partnership. Only small drain required. Very fair. Join me.
To all: the Leech is friendly. I attach to empires. Help them. Mutual benefit. Nothing parasitic. Trust.
casualMessage: Checking on my hosts today, {empire_name}. All feeding smoothly. They don't notice. That's ideal.
The drain continues. Slow and steady. Healthy hosts remain healthy. Until I'm ready to detach.
Monitoring attached empires. Some weakening nicely. Others still strong. All feeding the Leech.
